recommended_action:
1. Go to SQL servers
2. For this server instance
3. Click on Auditing
4. Select Storage Details
5. Set Retention (days) setting greater than 90 days
6. Select OK
7. Select Save
rationale: Audit Logs can be used to check for anomalies and give insight into suspected breaches or misuse of information and access.

state.errorMessage: SQL server does not have auditing enabled.

retentionDays.errorMessage: SQL server does not have auditing retention span of greater than 90 days.
